body.p: Topics: Gareth Bowker joins General Assembly of FSFE, Free Knowledge Foundation associates with FSFE, UN Consultations on Internet Governance Forum (IGF), UN WIPO: Provisional Committee on a Development Agenda (PCDA), FSFE's office moves to DÃ¼sseldorf, Second Fellowship meeting in Berlin, Microsoft antitrust case: 2 million EUR per day, FSFE at FOSDEM, FSFE organises SWPAT roundtable in Brussels, Fellowship: Get a 3 month LWN subscription and win a notebook!.
